nodes.text: Hermi Odle was a male Baragwin gangster who worked for Jabba the Hutt. He worked as a weapons specialist who helped craft the defenses of Jabba's Palace.
Hermi Odle first appeared in the 1983 film Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi, played by the mime artist Phil Herbert, who wore a full-body creature suit to portray the character.[source?]
Odle's name is likely a take on 'Hear Me Yodel'.
